character.data.belphegor.name: Belphegor
character.data.belphegor.description: Belphegor was an outcast but living a peaceful and pious life. When abominations from other planes started appearing Belphegor decided it was time to dust off his trusty weapon and restore the peace.
character.data.belphegor.playstyle: Jack of all trades, can scout, heal, defend, attack and debuff enemies
character.data.belphegor.description.vis: Bipedal creature resembling a bull with long brown horns and firey orange eyes. Furry limbs, a long furry tail and a large beard going around its head. Wearing large bracelets on each arm adorned by red jewels. Carrying a woodden club with three sharp fangs made of bones. He is not wearing any clothing except for a basic leather belt.
